exhalted.name: Exhalted Element
exhalted.desc_god: This Card can be used to match any Element in a Trial.
exhalted.desc_devil: This Card can be used to match any Element in a Trial.

consecrate.name: Consecrate
consecrate.desc_god: Remove one Energy from a Hero on Mukaki's side.
consecrate.desc_devil: Remove one Energy from a Hero on Makari-Hari's side.

altered.name: Altered Trial
altered.desc_god: Replace the current Trial Card with this Spell Card and Element.
altered.desc_devil: Replace the current Trial Card with this Spell Card and Element.

blessed.name: Blessed Trial
blessed.desc_god: Add this Spell Card and Element as an additional Trial Card.
blessed.desc_devil: Add this Spell Card and Element as an additional Trial Card.
